crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'device' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {'id': doc._id, 'name': doc.name, 'owner_id': doc.owner_id}); }

listing_by_owner.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'device' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.owner_id, {'id': doc._id, 'name': doc.name}); }

sip_credentials.map: function(doc) { if (typeof doc.sip == 'undefined' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; var sip = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(doc.sip)); sip.authorizing_id = doc._id; if(typeof(sip.realm) == 'string') { emit([sip.realm, sip.username], sip); } else { for (var i in sip.realm) emit([sip.realm[i], sip.username], sip); } }
